text:
Acer KB272 Hbi 27″ Full HD monitor
Amazon deal sees popular Acer monitor available for a faction of the price
This popular monitor has just been reduced on Amazon.

Learn more
The 2024
monitor deals are turning heads with their impressive offerings. Speaking of which, if you’re in the market for an all-round monitor that’s both budget-friendly and high-performing, we’ve got just the deal for you on Amazon. Right now, you can snag the Acer KB272 Hbi 27″ Zero-Frame Gaming and Office Monitor at a fraction of its original price.
Amazon is currently running a deal on this 100Hz display, available for just $99.99. That’s a substantial 31% discount from the initial price of $144.99, putting a solid $45 back into your pocket in the process. With almost 2,500 reviews and an average of 4.6 stars, we’re excited to see such a popular item discounted by so much already this year.
Why do we like this Acer monitor deal?
- 27-Inch 1080p Display: Get clear, sharp visuals whether browsing sites, creating content, or powering through tasks with the nimble full HD resolution.
- Gameplay: Its AMD FreeSync support enhances fluidity by matching the monitor’s refresh rate to the GPU’s frame rate, preventing stuttering.
- Refresh and Response: Its 100Hz refreshes pair with a 1 ms response time for clear motion clarity in action-heavy games and movies, avoiding ghosting.
- Adjustable Tilt: You can set the ideal personalized viewing position, whether working long hours or casually surfing in the evening.
- Blue Light Reduction: Its built-in Acer EyeProtect settings filter out excessive blue light wavelengths to minimize eye fatigue.
- Connectivity: An HDMI port readily supports modern laptops and devices, while the VGA input handles legacy connections.
Should you pick up this Acer monitor deal?
This Acer
27-inch monitor hits a nice balance between features and affordability for casual gaming and work. It displays content in decent 1920×1080 Full HD while keeping motion fairly fluid at a 100Hz refresh rate, enabled by AMD FreeSync. Its 1 ms response time also provides a responsive feel for faster-paced games. On the productivity side, tilt adjustability lets you customize viewing angles, while blue light filtering assists with eye comfort during lengthy workdays. Connectivity is a bit limited, but it covers the essentials. Though not breaking any speed records, it brings a well-rounded package for the price of $99.99.
